welcome_message_body: Welcome to Aizawa, Japan! This charming city is known for its beautiful parks, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Aizawa has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yokota AFB Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Yokota AFB Airport is used for military flights and operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main and largest terminal at Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Haneda Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection every 3 hours.
